document_data.mainbody:
he cairn of Thelgaar Ironhand was the burial site of Jarl Thelgaar Ironhand of Oman within the Moonshae Isles. 
The burial site was located in the Old Stone Wood on the western side of Omans Isle near the village of Trondhelm where Thelgaar was born.
Local legend stated that Jarl Thelgaar was buried with his wealth, which included his greatsword Ironhands Reckoning, an enchanted longship that could never sink, and powerful magical armor. These riches were believed to be guarded by a variety of traps and primal spirits.
